author: sky.cactus
content:
So when I went to make a PR to propose a change to use `./eip-x.md` for linking, I found this gem in the readme:
> The canonical URL for a EIP that has achieved draft status at any point is at https://eips.ethereum.org/. For example, the canonical URL for EIP-1 is ./eip-1.md.

author: sky.cactus
content: Which suggests we *did* in fact have a rule, it was just written in the wrong place.  ðŸ˜›

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!425279588009246720> Was there a reason you pinged me on 2649?

author: sky.cactus
content: Looks like just adding assets to a draft, which the automerge bot doesn't merge at the moment only due to lack of the feature being implemented.

author: axic3354
content: I was in a rush and forgot to write the message, but was unsure about copyright implications since those images had screenshots of facebook, etc.

author: axic3354
content:
Added a bunch of things to the validator wish list: https://github.com/lightclient/eipv/issues

Probably I should have opened some of these issues (the HTML ones) directly on the EIP repo to discuss, but perhaps we can discuss them there.

author: lightclient
content: thanks <@!425279588009246720> , lots of great ideas to implement in `eipv`

author: axic3354
content: This was discussed multiple times, but no real process proposal was made so far. Here's one for automatically withdrawing stalled PRs: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/2941#issuecomment-687919486

author: axic3354
content: It would be nice to reduce the pending PR count to below 100 (hopefully https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2949 helps with this) and reduce the number of drafts by at least 50% this year.
